adHeader: Lawn Mower/ Light Duty Tractor Repair
adDetails: Hello my name is Max I am a John Deere Trained Technician with consumer products. I worked for a John Deere in Washington State where I learned the in and out of lawn mower and small engine repair. I have all the tools necessary to keep your machine running from simple services to machine diagnostics. I am mobile and I am ready to come work on your machine. In addition to working at John Deere I was also the head mechanic at a golf course where I also received my Toro trained certifications. While At John Deere I received lots of training including spending a week in Wichita, Kansas learning even more about riding mowers and walk behind mowers. I am also a Honda Trained Technician. I will Flat rate some jobs and other jobs I will perform an hourly rate. Also Some travel charges may apply. Please contact me Via email or give me a call at show contact info if I do not answer please leave me a message. with Your name and phone number.
